categories: Category:Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game fiction

nodes.text: "Introduction" is a very brief short story kicking off the roleplaying-game supplement The Kathol Rift, published by West End Games in May 1996. It is set in 8 ABY.
Moff Kentor Sarne and Captain Brannij of the Imperial Navy sit on the bridge of the Imperial Star Destroyer Bastion and discuss the FarStar, a New Republic vessel that is pursuing them.
